ValidationRule.description: Block adding new broker into opportunity when Opportunity's Stage does not equal 'New', 'Prospect', 'Qualified'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW()&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, 'New'))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Prospect'))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Eligibility Approved'))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Qualified'))&& NOT(Bypass_New_Broker_Validation__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Opportunity is locked for adding new broker.
